tool_description: An API that shows you all the latest news happening in and around Hollywood.
name: Movie Articles and News
title: Movie Articles and News

api_list.name: Get Articles By Publisher
api_list.description: Get articles by a specific publisher.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-articles-and-news.p.rapidapi.com/articles/thr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-articles-and-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movie-articles-and-news.p.rapidapi.com/articles/{publisher}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie-articles-and-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Articles
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all articles about movies from various publishers.
